name: Rclone-Tg-Bot
description: An rclone telegram bot to mirror-leech and transfer to many cloud servers

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks when in env mode

OWNER_ID.description: should be an integer. ID of owner of bot

ALLOWED_USERS.description: list of IDs of allowed users who can use this bot separated by spaces

ALLOWED_CHATS.description: list of IDs of allowed chats who can use this bot separated by spaces

RCLONE_CONFIG.description: content of the rclone.conf file generated with rclone command-line program.
